content:
I've just claimed https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/80255. Eek! Would love some advice on this. Looking around the code at the moment to see what kind of data is available to the method here: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/11c94a197726b6a981828cb1837d7c3eed1b841d/compiler/rustc_middle/src/ty/error.rs#L83-L95

It's in an impl block for TypeError, so that's surely of interest... There's a tcx lifetime on it, so there's that... :thinking:
